name: Isekai Simulator 2024
description:
The world of Elysia was once a mighty Empire, until a great catastrophe tore it apart. In its place are ten kingdoms, ruled by ten tyrants and their descendants.

There is a prophecy, though, that say a great Hero will arrive and unite the world with their godlike powers.

You are that Hero, for you have been summoned by the god of this realm to be that Hero.

Yes, you, the person who got hit by a truck while walking around Tokyo.

Now, I know what you might be thinking: "This is just like my Japanese animes!"

Well... actually... oh no...

You're an isekai protagonist, aren't you?

Yeah... just one problem. See, you may be a  Hero, but this is an entire continent full of warlords and their armies.

Also, you don't know how to fight.

So, what can a would-be anime protagonist do when they're up against these odds?

Well, the only logical explanation is to get your own magical truck, send it back to Earth, and have it run over more people so you'll can summon more Heroes!

Put those Heroes to work in the camps and temples so you can buy more trucks to run more people over in the street to summon them to this world!

Keep summoning more heroes to gather more resources and run more people over until your army is ready to make their move.

After all, it is your destiny to unite the fractured kingdoms of Elysia.

And if that means you will conquer every province with human waves' worth of anime protagonists, then so be it.

Available Now, on April 1st, 2023!
